/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is flanked by lush green trees and bushes, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding to the overall tranquility of the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire landscape. In the distance, power lines stretch across the sky, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of urbanity to the otherwise natural setting. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
